title: Red Flag Domains
description:
Red Flag Domains are lists of very recently registered probably malicious domain names in french TLDs. More details can be found ”https://red.flag.domains/”.

The OpenCTI Red Flag Domain Connector facilitates the import of domain names from the Red Flag Domains platform into OpenCTI.
short_description: Red Flag Domains are lists of very recently registered probably malicious domain names in french TLDs.
